channel.title: Comments on: The Bitcoin Podcast #394- Anthony D’ Onofrio aka Texture

item.description: […] Our guest is Anthony D’ Onofrio, a founding member of Ethereum, a Twitter personality, and a creator on the NFT project TexturePunx. Social Media Of Anthony D ‘Onofrio Twitter: https://twitter.com/iamtexture Twitter: https://twitter.com/texturepunx Discord: https://t.co/GU6MwJLVda The Bitcoin Podcast Social Media Join-Slack: https://launchpass.com/thebitcoinpodcast Patreon:https://www.patreon.com/TheBitcoinPodcastNetwork Website: / Twitter: https://twitter.com/thebtcpodcast DADDAO: https://daddao.org/ Source link […]
